__e: Haven't been able to sleep lately, and I thought that would do the trick.
Could we change the subject? I need my sleep. I'm really tired from the trip.
But if I could fall asleep, and never wake up, it would be the end of my worries.
It's your fault! he's scared of the dark.
You know I can never fall asleep when you're away.
Well, I guess there's nothing to do except read a little More until I can fall asleep.
So, yes, I helped put them to sleep, but only so they wouldn't have the memories.
It's difficult to lie still and fear going to sleep when it's there to think about.
I also know that the best way to get my sister to fall asleep is to...
